title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Concerns about sweeteners, apple cider vinegar and healthier skin, boosting new memories, benefits of soaking seeds and... <!--more--> nuts.
Then new information from Helen Caldicott on Obama approval of raising acceptable levels of radioactivity in drinking water.
Also, the decline of arctic summer ice, and how the biotech industry is gagging  the science around GM foods.
Withering drought in america.
Commentaries from Ralph Nader and Bruce Dixon on Obama.
Finally, Gary’s thoughts on the death of Margaret Thatcher.
